results.name: Triangle read by rows, descending antidiagonals of a (1, 3, 5, ...) * (1, 4, 16, ...) multiplication table.
comment: Binary representation of all terms ends in an even number of zeros (cf. A003159).
formula: Triangle read by rows, descending antidiagonals of a (1, 3, 5, ...) * (1, 4, 16, ...) multiplication table.
example: Given the multiplication table (1, 3, 5, ...) * (1, 4, 16, ...); i.e., odd numbers as column headings, powers of 4 along the left border:
Rows of the triangle = descending antidiagonals of the array, getting:
